Origins: On 11 October 2013, the 2-year-old son of Minnesota Vikings star running back Adrian Peterson died on in a Sioux Falls, S.D., hospital, reportedly from severe head injuries he suffered as the result of a beating:
Description: Joseph Patterson, the boyfriend of the child's mother, has been arrested and charged with two felonies in connect with the child's death: At the time of the incident, the child was under the care of a 27-year-old male at that address, and no one else was home. While at the hospital, and during treatment, it was learned the child had sustained bodily injuries not considered to be accidental and consistent with abuse. The male caregiver is the boyfriend of the child s mother, and he was identified as: Patterson, Joseph Robert, 27, and the South Connie Avenue address is his home. Patterson was subsequently arrested and charged with two felonies as a result of the investigation. Those charges are: Aggravated battery of an infant and aggravated assault, both of which will be handled by the Lincoln County States Attorney Office, as this occurred in Lincoln County.
Example: [Collected via e-mail, October 2013] I saw this on Facebook. Is this true? Sad news! Claim: The 2-year-old son of NFL star Adrian Peterson has died as the result of an apparent beating.
